name: Python 3
updateContentCommand:
\
sudo apt-get update && \
sudo apt-get install -y build-essential wget libsqlite3-dev sqlite3 && \
# Upgrade SQLite to latest stable (>=3.35.0) \
wget https://www.sqlite.org/2025/sqlite-autoconf-3410200.tar.gz && \
tar xvfz sqlite-autoconf-3410200.tar.gz && \
cd sqlite-autoconf-3410200 && \
./configure --prefix=/usr/local && \
make && sudo make install && \
cd .. && rm -rf sqlite-autoconf-3410200* && \
[ -f packages.txt ] && sudo xargs apt install -y <packages.txt; \
[ -f requirements.txt ] && pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt; \
pip3 install --user streamlit; \
echo 'âœ… Packages installed and Requirements met'
